notable_moments: Launched the show with first-ever episode; Established show format
bio: MTV VJ who brought mainstream presentation style to heavy metal programming

notable_moments: Hosted during transition from glam to thrash metal; Featured international acts
bio: MTV VJ and radio personality; Later became internet pioneer and podcasting innovator

notable_moments: Most iconic host; Navigated grunge explosion; Maintained metal credibility; Moscow Music Peace Festival coverage
bio: Owner of The Cathouse club in Hollywood; Most associated with show's golden age

notable_moments: Revived show after 8-year hiatus; Championed metalcore and extreme metal
bio: Frontman of Hatebreed; Active musician hosting about his own genre
